page.title: 09Education
page.content: St. Anne's Catholic School was built in 1899. There are 7 classes and 188 children in the whole school.They have a libary and they use it as a television room.They have no grass or playing fields.They are hopefully getting a new school in two years time.They have a football and a netball team.The headmaster has been there for eight and a half years,there priest there is called Father Sheehan. At our school St. Pauls our vicar is called Canon Wilson. There are six teachers and one headmaster called Mr.Anson.In 1910 there were 304 chidren in this school.We are having a playing field of our very own,we have a new block built on for the infants.We have got a computer in our school and we have assembly every morning.
